verses.verse: How lovely <S%H3039><s%> are your dwellings, <S%H4908><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies! <S%H6635><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> longs, <S%H3700><s%> and even faints <S%H3615><s%> for the courts <S%H2691><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> and my flesh <S%H1320><s%> cry out <S%H7442><s%> for the living <S%H2416><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>

Yes, <S%H6833><s%> the sparrow has found <S%H4672><s%> a home, <S%H1004><s%> and the swallow <S%H1866><s%> a nest <S%H7064><s%> for herself, <S%H7896><s%> where she may have her young, <S%H667><s%> near your altars, <S%H4196><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> my King, <S%H4428><s%> and my God. <S%H430><s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in your house. <S%H1004><s%> They are always praising <S%H1984><s%> you. <S%H5542><s%> Selah.
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are those <S%H120><s%> whose strength <S%H5797><s%> is in you; <S%H3824><s%> who have set their hearts on a pilgrimage. <S%H4546><s%>

Passing <S%H5674><s%> through the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Weeping, <S%H1056><s%> they make <S%H7896><s%> it a place of springs. <S%H4599><s%> Yes, <S%H4175><s%> the autumn rain covers <S%H5844><s%> it with blessings. <S%H1293><s%>
They go <S%H3212><s%> from strength <S%H2428><s%> to strength. <S%H2428><s%> Everyone of them appears <S%H7200><s%> before God <S%H430><s%> in Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer. <S%H8605><s%> Listen, <S%H8085><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Behold, <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%> our shield, <S%H4043><s%> look <S%H5027><s%> at the face <S%H6440><s%> of your anointed. <S%H4899><s%>

For a day <S%H3117><s%> in your courts <S%H2691><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than a thousand. <S%H505><s%> I would rather <S%H977><s%> be a doorkeeper <S%H5605><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of my God, <S%H430><s%> than to dwell <S%H1752><s%> in the tents <S%H168><s%> of wickedness. <S%H7562><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is a sun <S%H8121><s%> and a shield. <S%H4043><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> and glory. <S%H3519><s%> He withholds <S%H4513><s%> no good <S%H2896><s%> thing from those who walk <S%H1980><s%> blamelessly. <S%H8549><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> who trusts in you. <S%H982><s%>
